meanings.definition: Costing a very high amount of money; extremely expensive.
meanings.sent1: The luxury car was ultraexpensive, beyond what most people could afford.
meanings.sent2: The designer handbag was ultraexpensive, but it was worth every penny.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the ice cream sundae was so ultraexpensive, it must have been made with gold flakes!
meanings.sent4: The hotel suite was so ultraexpensive, staying there felt like living in a dream.
meanings.sent5: The ultraexpensive watch sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Characterized by being extremely costly or pricey.
meanings.sent1: The ultraexpensive jewelry set was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent2: The ultraexpensive restaurant had a waiting list for months.
meanings.sent3: The ultraexpensive concert tickets made me feel like a VIP.
meanings.sent4: The ultraexpensive yacht sailed gracefully in the crystal-clear waters.
meanings.sent5: The ultraexpensive painting was the centerpiece of the art gallery.
